definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
Dianjiang county in Fuling suburbs of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Dianjiang county in Fuling suburbs of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
to serve as a sacrificial victim/to suffer for sb else/scapegoat/to share sb's fate

sentences.english: Look at these coasters over here.
Use old newspaper to line your kitty litter box or your kitchen garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 用舊報紙墊你的貓沙盒或廚房垃圾桶。

sentences.english: I believe someone else suggested it would make a good doormat.
sentences.chinese: 也許會有人說不如把它放在門口做個地墊。

sentences.english: Other pad irons not to be supplied along with equipments shall be provided by the bidder.
sentences.chinese: 設備未附帶的其它墊鐵由投標人提供。

sentences.english: We can conform the levelness of the machine by means of shim and screw jack.
sentences.chinese: 我們可能利用墊鐵和螺絲千斤頂來調零件器的水平度。

sentences.english: The loss of further reed-beds led to them declining once more.
sentences.chinese: 蘆葦墊的進一步消失導致它們又一次數量驟減。

sentences.english: Side mirrors are replaced by external cameras, located above the rear fenders .
sentences.chinese: 一面鏡子取代外部攝像機，上方後方墊。

sentences.english: Fold proper air cap with bubble facing outer into the bottom of the box.
sentences.chinese: 對疊好適量的氣泡墊放入箱底，氣泡麪朝外。

sentences.english: The milling machine was firmly chocked up.
sentences.chinese: 那臺銑牀用楔子穩固地支墊著。

sentences.english: Both men were wearing hard hats and protective ear pads .
sentences.chinese: 兩人都戴着安全帽和護耳墊。

sentences.english: There is a bolster across the head of the bed.
Don't forget the salad forks and the placemats.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了沙拉叉和餐具墊喔。

sentences.english: Kids will enjoy rolling the fondant on the work mat with the rolling pin.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們將享受滾動達特的工作與墊擀麪杖。

sentences.english: Shoes and boots go right onto the waterproof mat laid out next to the wall, , and coats go on the coat rack behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 鞋靴擺放在靠牆的防水墊上，外套掛在門後。

sentences.english: They sandbagged their homes to keep out floods.
sentences.chinese: 他們在房屋周圍墊上沙袋以抵禦水災。

sentences.english: A few drops of a detection liquid are placed on a pad that has been dipped into a drink.
sentences.chinese: 滴幾滴這種測試液在浸過飲品的小墊上。

definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
